full_text.0: @LeviPunckelton The context behind the quote is also crucial. If I tell you a quote is from Gandhi and you believe it, then I reveal it’s from Stalin, that doesn’t mean you should agree with Stalin. It’s deliberate deception as a “gotcha!” https://t.co/fZk7J6D5Vw
full_text.1: @BANKER_MAK And a wannabe dictator. As for allies, FDR allied with Stalin, who was a monster. Lesser of two evils in this case was the right, if fraught approach.
